parameters.definition: Limit for the number of transactions for currency i
Exchange rate from currency i to currency j

description: The objective is to maximize the number of units of currency \param{N} that we end up with at the end of the day, through a sequence of currency transactions. We start with a certain amount \param{Start} for each currency, there is a limit \param{Limit} to the number of transactions we can perform for each currency, and the exchange rates are given by \param{Rate}.
